name: PANORAMA3000
description:
We are one of Germany's leading agencies for digital change and social media. Since 2003, we develop digital strategies for communication, marketing, learning, business and change.
We create campaigns and content and care for communities. We build and customizes platforms, websites und tools and reach out to audiences via paid social, influencer relations and digital advertising. We develop programs for internal knowledge building and sustainable growth.
We were granted numerous industry awards for digital strategy and creative solutions. PANORAMA3000 is an idea about the digital future, a digital agency and a diverse team of 40 specialists based in Berlin.
